subject: Re: [junit] How to test private methods, its urgent
msgSnippet: ... 1. Every question is urgent. 2. Google JUnit private methods and you ll get more than enough information. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
bhanu sistla wrote:

> Hi all
>
> i am having some private methods in a class. how to test them. can any

1. Every question is urgent.
2. Google "JUnit private methods" and you'll get more than enough
information.

J. B. Rainsberger,
